name: CORONA WARRIORS
description:
This game was created for spreading awareness for Covid-19 and also to pay tribute all those CORONA WARRIORS who helped us during these difficult times. They are the real heroes.  Best experience with touch screen device. Harder than you think. Some enemies attack based on how you control your player!

The Mask Power-up : Hold the Super button to avoid getting infected

The Sanitizer Power-up : Press the Super key button to shoot drops to kill the virus in your surroundings

Default : Hold the Super key button for increasing your speed.

Do remember that the power-ups are only accessible for 20 seconds

Some enemies respond to your movement i.e. your movement determines their next move!

All you have to do is take precautions, avoid virus and survive till the cure is found. With exciting power-ups like Sanitizers and Masks. The game has 3 Worlds each consisting of 4 levels, Every level harder than the previous one. Can you survive? Best of Luck!
